text: Sam Matekane (born 15 March 1958) is a Mosotho businessman and politician. In October 2022, Matekane was elected the Prime Minister of Lesotho. He is the founder of Matekane Group of Companies. He formed a political party, the Revolution for Prosperity (RFP) in March 2022. He was named the richest citizen of Lesotho with a net worth of $5 million. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:African businesspeople Category:Prime ministers of Lesotho
title: Sam Matekane
